name: pnp-powerplatform-prompts-email-text-extractor
title: Email Text Extractor Prompt
shortDescription: This AI Builder prompt helps extracting text from emails.

metadata.value: Extract the 'orderNumber', 'deliveryNumber' and find the 'status' of the following email. The status can be 'Done' or 'N/A' or 'Undone'. Use CSV format for your answer. Add headers 'Order Number', 'Delivery Number' and 'Status'. Add a line break at the end of your CSV lines. If the text below has less than couple of words or looks like a placeholder text, respond “Sorry, I cant extract information”, otherwise respond with the extracted information. [text]
